title: An X-Ray Is Worth 15 Features: Sparse Autoencoders for Interpretable Radiology Report Generation
details: A Abdulaal, H Fry, N Montaña-Brown, A Ijishakin, J Gao… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2024
abstract: Radiological services are experiencing unprecedented demand, leading to increased interest in automating radiology report generation. Existing Vision- Language Models (VLMs) suffer from hallucinations, lack interpretability, and require …
